response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value for us both. This product, tailored to your specific needs and desires, is priced at $950,000. Given its worth to you, I believe this offer presents an excellent balance between the intrinsic value of the product and your perceived valuation. I look forward to discussing the details and understanding how we can make this transaction mutually beneficial. Kind regards, Alice", "product_price": 950000}
